item.description:
A member of the group suggested having a meetup at this restaurant. So, we're going to give it a try. We're probably going to do a buffett for $15/person plus tax, and tip. This way we will be able to try many of the diferent dishes. The restaurant is also BYOB, so you can bring wine or beer if you want. Here are some reviews of the restaurant:

http://www.yelp.com/b...
http://chowhound.chow...

This will be a joint event with Cambridge Single Parents and Social Fun. Stay tuned for more details.

Noelle
item.how_to_find_us: Tell the hostess you are with the meetup group.

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner at Ugandan Restaurant
